name: Super Fuzzy Beach Dater Demo
description:
You are a cat guy who has been laid off from a boring but (supposedly) stable office job. With chances of reemployment looking slim, you decide to get a fresh start somewhere new, and fulfill one of your last dreams—to live near a beach.

And maybe there… you'll find a girl... or a guy... that you'll be able to spend the rest of your life with.

Or at least an afternoon or two.

From the deep recesses of the mind of the host of a somewhat popular YouTube channel comes a furry dating sim like not many people have ever seen before… Super Fuzzy Beach Dater.

Features:

  • 19 scene specific CGs, even in this demo! That's because there are no character sprites at all—every graphic is a CG!
  • Meticulously handcrafted pixel art! All with 16 colors or less!
  • 7 slightly-less-meticulously handcrafted music tracks!
  • Deep and interesting plot! (I hope)
  • It is a computer game that has a menu bar! This is extremely rare!
  • Small download size! 7MB!
  • Has furries! Or anthros! Or funny animals! Or whatever you people call them these days!

Download today, and immerse yourself in a world of intrigue and romance!

Warning: While this game does not show or say anything explicit, it is fundamentally about cartoon animal people trying to get laid, and can get quite risqué. If that sort of thing bothers you, play with caution.
